title: Bonkers Grindhouse WWII Action Movie 'Dick Dynamite 1944' Trailer
description: "Remind me of your name one more time?" Epic Pictures has revealed an official trailer for a Scottish WWII action thriller movie called Dick Dynamite 1944, made by filmmaker Robbie Davidson. Dick Dynamite: The Movie is a full-on, bonkers cinematic tale featuring "creative, over-the-top kills, incredible stunt work, & tongue-in-cheek grindhouse humor. The only thing higher than the body-count is the number of instantly quotable one-liners." Ha ha. In the dying days of World War II, Dick Dynamite and his ragtag team of Nazi-killing commandos must stop a group of depraved German scientists from turning the population of New York into flesh-eating zombies. Bring it on! Starring Gary Snars Allan aka Snars, with Olly Bassi, Shaun Davidson, Mark Burdett, Adam Harper, and Valerie Birss. Plus cameos from famous rock musicians. "Dick Dynamite is a rock-and-roll rollercoaster through World War II—Robbie packed it with action, blood, guts and Zombies and you’re going to love it." This looks uber crazy and explosive and totally mad! Hell yes. Here's the official trailer (+ posters) for Robbie Davidson's Dick Dynamite 1944, direct from YouTube: "As a small-time filmmaker from Scotland, having my project showcased on the big screen in Hollywood is a dream I […]

text: TRAILERS by November 18, 2024Source: YouTube "Remind me of your name one more time?" Epic Pictures has revealed an official trailer for a Scottish WWII action thriller movie called Dick Dynamite 1944, made by filmmaker Robbie Davidson. Dick Dynamite: The Movie is a full-on, bonkers cinematic tale featuring "creative, over-the-top kills, incredible stunt work, & tongue-in-cheek grindhouse humor. The only thing higher than the body-count is the number of instantly quotable one-liners." Ha ha. In the dying days of World War II, Dick Dynamite and his ragtag team of Nazi-killing commandos must stop a group of depraved German scientists from turning the population of New York into flesh-eating zombies. Bring it on! Starring Gary Snars Allan aka Snars, with Olly Bassi, Shaun Davidson, Mark Burdett, Adam Harper, and Valerie Birss. Plus cameos from famous rock musicians. "Dick Dynamite is a rock-and-roll rollercoaster through World War II—Robbie packed it with action, blood, guts and Zombies and you’re going to love it." This looks uber crazy and explosive and totally mad! Hell yes. Here's the official trailer (+ posters) for Robbie Davidson's Dick Dynamite 1944, direct from YouTube: "As a small-time filmmaker from Scotland, having my project showcased on the big screen in Hollywood is a dream I never thought possible! I’m absolutely thrilled to share Dick Dynamite with an audience that it truly deserves! This film is more than just a low-budget underground project; it represents the dedication and passion of an entire community that came together to create something special." –Director Robbie Davidson It's the first day of April in 1945, the Axis shaken after a round of blockbusters decimate buildings around the Nazi occupied war-torn city of Kassel, Germany. A group of German soldiers huddle round to keep the heat, smoking cigarettes in buildings almost reduced to rubble telling tales of a one man wrecking ball who seems impervious to German bullets, striking fear into the hearts of Wehrmacht and Schutzstaffel alike. Who is this man? He is the Nazi-crushing, Panzer-eating Dick Dynamite (Gary Snars Allan). Dick Dynamite 1944 is written and directed by Scottish indie filmmaker Robbie Davidson, making his feature directorial debut after a few other short films previously. Produced by Jeffrey J. Ellen and Beans Goldblum. This project was funded by a Kickstarter campaign initially. This first premiered at the 2023 Night Visions Film Festival last year. Epic Pictures will debut Davidson's Dick Dynamite 1944 movie in select US theaters on December 6th, 2024, then on VOD starting on December 10th coming soon. Anyone down for this? html:
TRAILERS

by
November 18, 2024
Source: YouTube

"Remind me of your name one more time?" Epic Pictures has revealed an official trailer for a Scottish WWII action thriller movie called Dick Dynamite 1944, made by filmmaker Robbie Davidson. Dick Dynamite: The Movie is a full-on, bonkers cinematic tale featuring "creative, over-the-top kills, incredible stunt work, & tongue-in-cheek grindhouse humor. The only thing higher than the body-count is the number of instantly quotable one-liners." Ha ha. In the dying days of World War II, Dick Dynamite and his ragtag team of Nazi-killing commandos must stop a group of depraved German scientists from turning the population of New York into flesh-eating zombies. Bring it on! Starring Gary Snars Allan aka Snars, with Olly Bassi, Shaun Davidson, Mark Burdett, Adam Harper, and Valerie Birss. Plus cameos from famous rock musicians. "Dick Dynamite is a rock-and-roll rollercoaster through World War II—Robbie packed it with action, blood, guts and Zombies and you’re going to love it." This looks uber crazy and explosive and totally mad! Hell yes.

Here's the official trailer (+ posters) for Robbie Davidson's Dick Dynamite 1944, direct from YouTube:

"As a small-time filmmaker from Scotland, having my project showcased on the big screen in Hollywood is a dream I never thought possible! I’m absolutely thrilled to share Dick Dynamite with an audience that it truly deserves! This film is more than just a low-budget underground project; it represents the dedication and passion of an entire community that came together to create something special." –Director Robbie Davidson

It's the first day of April in 1945, the Axis shaken after a round of blockbusters decimate buildings around the Nazi occupied war-torn city of Kassel, Germany. A group of German soldiers huddle round to keep the heat, smoking cigarettes in buildings almost reduced to rubble telling tales of a one man wrecking ball who seems impervious to German bullets, striking fear into the hearts of Wehrmacht and Schutzstaffel alike. Who is this man? He is the Nazi-crushing, Panzer-eating Dick Dynamite (Gary Snars Allan). Dick Dynamite 1944 is written and directed by Scottish indie filmmaker Robbie Davidson, making his feature directorial debut after a few other short films previously. Produced by Jeffrey J. Ellen and Beans Goldblum. This project was funded by a Kickstarter campaign initially. This first premiered at the 2023 Night Visions Film Festival last year. Epic Pictures will debut Davidson's Dick Dynamite 1944 movie in select US theaters on December 6th, 2024, then on VOD starting on December 10th coming soon. Anyone down for this?

Find more posts: Indies, To Watch, Trailer
